name: Puzzle Robot
description:
This is a small platformer game, its my first official game that I'm happy to share, a lot of time went into this and I'm very happy with it. Made with Game Maker Studio 2

-3 levels

- Windows Only!

- Cautious with the sound (might be loud, music is nothing special)

-Fullscreen

Comment any bugs, glitches, etc.

If you want me to continue developing it leave a comment with yes and add an idea for it.
